content.raw:
Arthur, 

I pushed a change to the pull request branch that updates the upward and downward lasers to be modeled after the lidarlite v3 \(from your x4\_sensor\_config\_7 branch\).  I also modified the 2D lidar to be modeled after the RPLidar S1.  I pushed those changes.  Will you confirm that those changes take effect in the pull request?  Let me know if I need to do anything else to get the pull request accepted.
content.html:
Arthur,

I pushed a change to the pull request branch that updates the upward and downward lasers to be modeled after the lidarlite v3 (from your x4_sensor_config_7 branch). I also modified the 2D lidar to be modeled after the RPLidar S1. I pushed those changes. Will you confirm that those changes take effect in the pull request? Let me know if I need to do anything else to get the pull request accepted.
